data.eml:eml: Two new species of the Genus Clathria (Demospongiae: Poecilosclerida: Microcionidae) from Jeju Island, Korea

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kang, Dong Won, Kim, Hyung June (2018): Two new species of the Genus Clathria (Demospongiae: Poecilosclerida: Microcionidae) from Jeju Island, Korea. Zootaxa 4504 (3): 390-400, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.3.5
